Package p4_group_8_repo.model.gameBase

Class Actor

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
p4_group_8_repo.model.gameBase.Actor
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
BackgroundImage, Car, CrocodileHead, Floatable, Fly, LadyFrog, LevelCleared, Levels, Life, Player, Score, Snake, Swamp
public abstract class Actor
extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView

Actor class

This class is responsible for setting every actor on the pane of game scene. it extends ImageView.

Since:
2020
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sham Maatouk
See Also:
ImageView

    • move

      public void move​(double dx, double dy)
      This method is responsible for moving the actors
      Parameters:
      dx - amount to be moved horizontally
      dy - amount to be moved vertically

      public <A extends Actor> List<A> getIntersectingObjects​(Class<A> cls)
      This method is responsible for returning a list of intersected actors
      Type Parameters:
      A - type Actor
      Parameters:
      cls - class actor belongs to
      Returns:
      array of Actors

    • act

      public abstract void act​(long now)
      This method is responsible making actors move and act through an animation timer
      Parameters:
      now - current time frame in nanoseconds
      See Also:
      act timer.
